channel.title: Beta Testing of Colourscape!
channel.description:
Hello people of Moparscape. I am here today to introduce you to Colourscape!
What is colourscape? Colourscape is a new rsps, that is currently in Beta, however i need some players to help me test things, so this is why im releasing it.
Home - The home is custom and contains lots of different things to do. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7mUIDBK.png[/img]
Stats - This is a picture of all stats, levelling is slow, making 99's rare. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TiHzppH.png[/img]
Teleports/Portals - 3 of the safe portals, leading to skills, slayer and whole loads of places. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TLfKj1E.png[/img]
Teleports/Portals - 3 of the dangerous portals, leading to bosses which hit hard. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LBlyDtv.png[/img]
Godwars interface with teleport and full on custom zones, with amazing drops. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WokNGaf.png[/img]
All skills working 100% (come test for yourself).
Perfect economy and skilling (although only 5 players).
Register on our forums @ www.colourscape.boards.net and get the client whilst you're there.
So much more, kinda short for time will edit this tomorrow. Hope you guys come and give colourscape a try!
Thanks, Main Owner Purple.

item.title: Beta Testing of Colourscape!
item.dc:creator: @purple123ftw purple123ftw
item.description:
@purple123ftw wrote:

Soulcist:

Please do not state that you need staff, it causes so much drama and unnessary people that want power to come onto the forums and stuff and beg for it, or strive for it - that makes it worse and then the staff team end up being corrupt.

My bad, edited and removed.

Read full topic

Might play on Friday
